sentences.en: Career-wise, this illness couldn't have come at a worse time.
sentences.cn: 考虑到事业，这场病来得最不是时候。

sentences.en: Conditions are getting worse and supplies are running out.
sentences.cn: 情况越来越糟糕，贮备物资也快用完了。

sentences.en: Conditions will get worse as the winter continues.
sentences.cn: 随着冬天持续下去，情况会更糟。

sentences.en: Don't let yourself despair; this will only make matters worse.
sentences.cn: 不要想不开，这样只能使情况变得更糟。

sentences.en: Don’t say anything, you’ll only make matters worse.
sentences.cn: 什么也别说，说了只会火上浇油。

sentences.en: Economically and politically, this affair couldn't come at a worse time.
sentences.cn: 无论从经济上还是政治上来看，这件事来得都太不是时候了。

sentences.en: For better or worse, he trusts everyone.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么样，他相信每个人

sentences.en: He arrived on January 9, disheveled and much the worse for wear.
sentences.cn: 他是1月9号到的，蓬头垢面，疲惫不堪。

sentences.en: He was in a blue funk! Worse than me!
sentences.cn: 他神经极为紧张！比我还糟！

sentences.en: he was somewhat the worse for drink at his farewell party.
sentences.cn: 他在自己的饯行宴上喝得微醉。

sentences.en: Her condition took a sharp turn for the worse.
sentences.cn: 她的病情突然急剧恶化。

sentences.en: Her mother, poor soul, came to an even worse end.
sentences.cn: 她的母亲，那个可怜的人，结局更糟糕。

sentences.en: High inflation will make unemployment worse.
sentences.cn: 高通货膨胀率将使失业状况更加严重。

sentences.en: if they were daft enough to believe it, so much the worse for them.
sentences.cn: 如果他们傻到相信这件事，对他们来说就更加不妙了。

sentences.en: Oscar, much the worse for vodka, did a striptease.
sentences.cn: 奥斯卡喝了伏特加后醉醺醺地跳起了脱衣舞。

sentences.en: Rose was a poor cook and a worse mother.
sentences.cn: 罗丝不太会做饭，更不会当母亲。

sentences.en: The bullying got worse and worse until finally he had to leave the school.
sentences.cn: 他所受的欺侮越来越过分，最后只得离开了学校。

sentences.en: the child might be born blind or worse.
sentences.cn: 那小孩也许天生是个瞎子，或者更糟。

sentences.en: The grandparents sigh and say how things have changed for the worse.
sentences.cn: 爷爷奶奶叹着气说情况变得如何如何糟糕。

sentences.en: The school’s not perfect, but I suppose it could be worse.
sentences.cn: 这所学校不是十全十美，不过我想还不算太糟吧。

sentences.en: The traffic is much worse after five o’clock.
sentences.cn: 5点以后交通拥堵严重得多。

sentences.en: The weather was a lot worse this year.
sentences.cn: 今年天气糟糕得多。

sentences.en: There’s nothing worse than being robbed while you’re on holiday.
sentences.cn: 没有比度假时被抢劫更糟的了。

sentences.en: These trends only got worse as we moved into the nineties.
sentences.cn: 我们步入20世纪90年代时，这些潮流变得更糟了。

sentences.en: They would criticize me, or worse yet, pay me no attention.
sentences.cn: 他们会指责我，或者更糟糕的是，干脆对我毫不理睬。

sentences.en: To make matters worse, it started to rain again.
sentences.cn: 更糟的是，又开始下雨了。

sentences.en: we were none the worse for our terrible experience.
sentences.cn: 我们有过一次可怕的经历但仅此而已。

sentences.en: You watch. Things will get worse before they get better.
sentences.cn: 看着吧，事情在好转之前会先恶化。

words.tran_cn: 恶化（worsen的ing形式）；使变得更坏

phrases.tran_cn: 不管好坏：不管情况或结果是好是坏

phrases.phrase: the worse for wear informal 非正式
phrases.tran_cn: （尤指人喝醉后）十分疲倦的，不舒服的
情况更坏，处境更糟；更不幸；更贫困

trans.tran_cn: 更差的，更严重的（bad, ill的比较级）
更糟（的是），更严重（badly的比较级）
trans.tran_en: in a more severe or serious way than before
